1.content:
Michael Scott arrived at Dunder Mifflin and today is all female day. He arrived early to set up a female empowerment presentation (he doesn’t realise how sexist it it).

Michael is near the reception minding his own business until ZAP.

Michael wakes up confused and on a strange carpet like survives. Michael realises that he is the size of an ant (probably those mysterious vitamins Dwight gave him).

Michael panics until he hears a BOOM

Who walks in
1.title: Shrunk In The Office

choices: Michael jumps on to Pams shoes
Pam stops in front of him
Pam see something on the floor
11.content:
Michael sees Pam walk into the office

Pam is wearing White blouse with a pink cardigan, a skirt, pantyhoses and black high heels

Michael is too small for Pam to see and compared to Michael Pam’s legs are the size of multiple large skyscrapers. Every step Pam takes creates an earthquake for Michael.

Michael tried to get her attention but it’s no use

So what happens next.
11.title: Pam Beesly

115.content:
“What is that on the floor? Ew, is that a bug?” Pam’s voice booms over the ant sized Michael. “Ugh, Dwight probably tracked them in. Better just take care of it myself.” Pam raised her black heel until it covered Michael’s vision. Soon the shadow of Pam’s foot completely covered Michael.
“Pam! No! It’s Michael! Your boss!” Michael screamed praying he could at least get Pam’s attention.
115.title: Pam see something on the floor

choices: Pam sees the “ant guts” and feels disgusted
1151.content:
Pam giant shoe comes crashing down on Michael.

Pam: Take that you stupid ant

Pam continues to walk to her desk but what she doesn’t realise is that Michael is actually stuck on Pam’s shoe in a crevice. Pam sits on her desk unaware that Michael is stuck on the bottom of her shoe.

Pam Is dangling her shoe with her toes and Michael can feel the wind and speed and is feeling noucious.

Michael: Well I guess this is as close as I’m gonna get to being with a women for while I guess. I gotta find a way off Pam “that’s what’s she said 😅”.

What happens next.
1151.title: Pam steps on Michael

choices: Angela sees Michael but thinks he’s a bug
Angela see’s an actual ant and steps on it
12.content: Angela walked in her black high heels, a tight skirt, and a fitted buttoned down shirt. Maybe she’ll hear me since she’s so short Micheal joked to himself. Michael jumped up and down waving his arms around hoping Angela would see the now ant sized boss. “Hey short stuff! Down here! It’s me, shorter stuff! No but really it’s me Michael!”
12.title: Angela Martin

choices: Angela decides to pick up the bug sized Michael
123.content: “Ugh, I can’t stand seeing bugs in the office. This is supposed to be a clean work space. If maintenance won’t take care of these bugs, then I will.” The goddess sized Angela raised her giant heel to step on her micro sized boss. “Don’t step on me pipsqueak! It’s me, Michael!” Michael started to run as Angela foot slammed down next to him as she missed the bug sized man. “Come on, you little pest! squish under my shoe!” Angela yelled down at the bug
123.title: Angela sees Michael but thinks he’s a bug

choices: Jan looks down and finds Michael
Jan is interrupted by either Pam or Angela
Jan thinks Michael is a bug
13.content: Jan walked in wearing tall black high heels, a tight pantsuit and a revealing blouse, storming in to find Michael. Oh look, my lover thought Michael. Jan impatiently tapped her foot looking for Michael, causing the ground to shake beneath Michael. “Jan! Hey lover! It’s me down here! Michael! I shrunk and I can’t get up!”
13.title: Jan Levinson

134.content:
“Where is that idiot?” Jab asked herself in frustration. “Jan, I’m down here!” Michael shouted running closer to his beautiful goddess sized boss.

“He better have the presentation ready.” Jab said looking up at the ceiling near the reception desk with a sigh.

Moments later Michael reached her black high heels.
“Women in this company need to be in charge of the men.” Jan said to herself looking at the company’s poor annual report.. “I swear if he doesn’t have the female empowerment presentation ready I will end him.” Jan said.

This made Michael pause with fear. “I would crush him like a bug right now if I could. Jan said clenching her hands into fists. “He is such a little loser, sometimes I wonder why I was with him, I need to find a new man.

After she said this Michael began to run away. As he was running away from the angry giantess, Jan looked down and saw him running towards his office room.

“Oh my God is that a bug!” Jan said inching closer to her shrunken male subordinate. “No Jan it’s me Michael!” Michael shouted waving his arms.

But it was too late. Jan’s high heels cast a huge shadow of the tiny pathetic man and stepped on him.

After her heel hit the floor Michael realized he was still alive. Her shoe had just missed him but she thought she had killed the “bug.” He realized the best he could do was play dead.

Unfortunately for Michael Jan grabbed a tissue with used gum inside from her purse and plucked the bug sized man off the floor with it. Michael was stuck to the gum unable to get free.

She walked to the ladies room and threw the tissue in one of the toilets. “I should go the bathroom now.” Jan thought to herself sitting down on the toilet.

After she removed her sexy black panties her huge vagina, ass, and clit cast a shadow over Michael as he struggled to get free from the gum in the tissue. “Nooooooooo!” Michael screamed as Jan...
134.title: Jan thinks Michael is a bug

Anything Sexual Goes, Go Crazy
